about_the_game:
The goal is simple - rid yourself of all your cards. Last player out is the Sh*thead.

🔄 Magic Cards
As you climb the ranked league system, you'll unlock new ruleset variants with powerful magic cards that let you manipulate the flow of the game and disrupt your opponents' plans

🏆 Competitive Progression:
Beat every league, earn achievements, and unlock new characters as you progress. Prove yourself as a champion by dominating the leaderboards and showcasing the fact that you, are in fact, not a Sh*thead.

👥 Connect and Conquer:
Create a private room with custom rules for you and your friends, or join the global community for ranked matches. Chat, strategize, and play with others from around the world.

With an unpredictable mix of luck and skill, Sh*thead is the classic backpacking card game loved around the globe.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0GHZ Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 740 (2048 MB) / Radeon HD 5770 (1024 MB) or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
